rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的二价 COVID-19 疫苗是我们一直在等待的加强疫苗吗？根据一项 3 期试验，葛兰素史克 (GSK) 和赛诺菲 (Sanofi) 开发的二价 COVID-19 疫苗显示出可喜的结果，针对症状性 COVID-19 的总体有效性为 64.7%。该疫苗作为加强疫苗的效果特别好，在非初次接种受试者中达到 75.9% 的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Is-the-new-bivalent-COVID-19-vaccine-the-booster-weve-been-waiting-for.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Is-the-new-bivalent-COVID-19-vaccine-the-booster-weve-been-waiting-for.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd0149bd-72df-4f53-af74-1e05b5c3e910 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 22:28:00 -0400 Is the new bivalent COVID-19 vaccine the booster we've been waiting for?
教师能否成为对抗儿童肥胖的秘密武器？最近的一项研究表明，配备营养教育资源的教师可以有效对抗服务欠缺地区的儿童肥胖问题。该研究强调了提高教师福祉和自我效能的专业发展计划的必要性，强调了他们作为公共卫生变革推动者的重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Can-teachers-be-the-secret-weapon-in-the-fight-against-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Can-teachers-be-the-secret-weapon-in-the-fight-against-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cea7bab-2e4e-45d3-9363-f46ed4956da8 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 22:05:00 -0400 Can teachers be the secret weapon in the fight against childhood obesity?
人工智能聊天机器人比人类更有创造力吗？新研究揭示了令人惊讶的结果发表在《科学报告》上的研究使用替代用途任务（AUT）比较了人类和人工智能聊天机器人的创造力，发现人工智能聊天机器人在为日常物品生成原始和逻辑用途方面普遍优于人类。尽管人工智能表现强劲，尤其是 ChatGPT4，但人类仍然有其独特的优势，凸显了创造力的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Are-AI-chatbots-more-creative-than- humans-New-study-reveals-surprising-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Are-AI-chatbots-more-creative-than- humans-New-study-reveals-surprising-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4a705dc-7982-4eb8-82b3-90ee617e3c51 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 21:41:00 -0400 Are AI chatbots more creative than humans? New study reveals surprising results
MDMA 辅助治疗可显着减轻 PTSD 症状新研究表明，MDMA 辅助疗法可显着减轻中度至重度 PTSD 患者的症状，其效果优于传统疗法和药物。这项覆盖美国和以色列多个地点的研究表明，虽然有效，但需要进一步研究来探索不同群体的潜在副作用和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/MDMA-auxiliary-therapy-reduces-PTSD-symptoms-dramatically.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/MDMA-auxiliary-therapy-reduces-PTSD-symptoms-dramatically.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cea4448d-0430-43f2-897f-d76ddecb8086 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 21:21:00 -0400 MDMA-assisted therapy reduces PTSD symptoms dramatically
你的漱口水中到底含有什么？土耳其研究泄露了薄荷的真相研究人员审查了土耳其市售漱口水的成分和潜在健康影响，揭示了有益和潜在有害成分的组合。该研究强调需要进一步研究漱口水成分对健康的影响，特别是考虑到土耳其牙齿疾病的高发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Whats-really-in-your-mouthwash-Turkish-study-spills-the-minty-truth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Whats-really-in-your-mouthwash-Turkish-study-spills-the-minty-truth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1750f016-ff44-4bd7-bc01-931ec65e1288 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 21:01:00 -0400 What's really in your mouthwash? Turkish study spills the minty truth
波兰海鸥携带新的冠状病毒株，凸显鸟类在病毒进化中的作用波兰的研究人员在黑头鸥和普通海鸥中发现了五种γ冠状病毒和δ冠状病毒，为这些病毒的多样性和进化潜力提供了新的线索。该研究强调了对冠状病毒动物储存库进行持续研究的必要性，因为它们构成人畜共患传播给人类的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Polish-gulls-harbor-new-coronavirus-strains-spotlighting-avian-role-in-viral-evolution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Polish-gulls-harbor-new-coronavirus-strains-spotlighting-avian-role-in-viral-evolution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ba2ff4d-183d-4c81-8ce4-b852c2c62c13 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 20:51:00 -0400 Polish gulls harbor new coronavirus strains, spotlighting avian role in viral evolution
将鱼类废物转化为抗癌药物：鲍鱼内脏肽如何成为医学领域的下一个重大事件研究人员探索鲍鱼内脏中生物活性肽的抗菌和抗癌特性的潜力。该研究发现其对各种细菌和真菌菌株具有良好的活性，并对前列腺癌细胞具有细胞毒性作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Turning-fish-waste-into-cancer-fighters-How-abalone-viscera-peptides-could-be-the-next-big-thing-in-医学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/Turning-fish-waste-into-cancer-fighters-How-abalone-viscera-peptides-could-be-the-next-big-thing-in- Medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc2afdd5-a12a-4a1e-b517-92cc2198d919 Sun, 17 Sep 2023 16:49:00 -0400 Turning fish waste into cancer fighters: How abalone viscera peptides could be the next big thing in medicine
目前的疫苗对新的 SARS-CoV-2 变种 BA.2.86 和 FLip 的抵抗力如何？该研究探讨了三剂单价或二价疫苗接种在中和新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种 BA.2.86 和 FLip 方面的功效。虽然与最近的 XBB 变体相比，BA.2.86 显示出较低的免疫逃避能力，但它被单克隆抗体 S309 的中和效果较差，引发了有关疫苗针对进化菌株的功效的疑问。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/How-well-do-current-vaccines-hold-up-against-new-SARS-CoV-2-variants-BA286-and-FLip.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230917/How-well-do-current-vaccines-hold-up-against-new-SARS-CoV-2-variants-BA286-and-FLip.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6aa0ea72-25ab-40f2-8914-2ae0741163ca Sun, 17 Sep 2023 16:34:00 -0400 How well do current vaccines hold up against new SARS-CoV-2 variants BA.2.86 and FLip?
研究揭示了夜班工人理想的午睡策略对 2012 年至 2018 年进行的夜班小睡试点研究的新分析揭示了理想的小睡策略，可能有助于抵消 16 小时通宵工作期间的困倦和疲劳。这些发现也能让新父母受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-reveals-ideal-napping-strategy-for-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-reveals-ideal-napping-strategy-for-night-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a9c0e1f-57c4-49b2-ad94-6d825add2d4d Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:20:00 -0400 Study reveals ideal napping strategy for night shift workers
疫情期间药剂师的工作量增加，工作环境更加恶劣顾客即使生病了也会出现，不同意这些限制，并且给员工带来了许多新任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Pharmacists-experienced-increased-workloads-and-tougher-work-environments-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Pharmacists-experienced-increased-workloads-and-tougher-work-environments-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56db3a7e-1462-4300-a17a-071cbe82470f Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:14:00 -0400 Pharmacists experienced increased workloads and tougher work environments during the pandemic
